_comment: Floor RPS baselines for GitHub Actions free runners (2-core shared). CI bench gate verifies the benchmark runs end-to-end without crashing — not throughput. Real throughput baselines are in bench_baselines.json, enforced locally via: make bench. Celebrity scenario is intentionally omitted — its name is dynamic (N-code hot pool) and varies with pool size.
_tolerance_note: CI uses 50% tolerance against these floor values. Local dev uses bench_baselines.json at 15%.
